attributes.action: investigate the case against the mother of two children observed in the Co-OP, Woolston
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Mother now has a black-mark against her record for the next 6 years. This is totally unjustified and invasive. We the undersigned call that her record be wiped clean and such invasive treatment of parents carrying out normal parental disipline be ceased. Follow the link to see related artical
